name: QuickActionResult

methods.name: getErrors
methods.description: If an error occurs, an array of one or more database error objects, along with error codes and descriptions, is returned.

methods.name: getIds
methods.description: The IDs of the QuickActions being processed.

methods.name: getSuccessMessage
methods.description: Returns the success message associated with the quick action.

methods.name: isCreated
methods.description: Returns true if the action is created; otherwise, false.

methods.name: isSuccess
methods.description: Returns true if the action completes successfully; otherwise, false.

description: After you initiate a quick action with the QuickAction class, use the QuickActionResult class for processing action results.
